snippet: The dispute over the Dokdo/Takeshima islets reflects Seoul’s anger over its treatment when Japan ruled the Korean Peninsula as a colonial power.
abstract: Territorial dispute between South Korea and Japan over Dokdo/Takeshima islets is one of several simmering in Asia that some analysts fear could lead to hostilities; increasingly shrill disputes between Japan and China and South Korea are potentially more explosive because of animosity stemming from Japan’s once brutal dominance of both countries.
lead_paragraph: The dispute over the Dokdo/Takeshima islets reflects Seoul’s anger over its treatment when Japan ruled the Korean Peninsula as a colonial power.

headline.seo: South Korea and Japan Fight Over Rocky Islets
headline.main: Fight Over Rocky Islets Opens Old Wounds Between South Korea and Japan
headline.print_headline: Fight Over Rocky Islets Opens Old Wounds Between South Korea and Japan
